Player History
Drafted in 2nd round, 29th overall pick, by New York (A) in 1974...
Traded from New York (A) to Minnesota on 2/20/1974 (Going to MIN: P J. Verhoeven. Going to NYY: RF M. Dimmel)...
Injured on 8/30/1978 with a Bone Chips Elbow, out for 6 weeks...
Traded from Minnesota to Atlanta on 7/7/1980 (Going to ATL: P D. Righetti, P J. Verhoeven, P R. Jackson, RF C. Maldonado, CF A. Otis. Going to MIN: CF T. Wakamatsu)...
Earned first career win on 7/20/1980...
Injured on 8/22/1980 with a Strained Back Muscle, out for 6 weeks...
Injured on 5/13/1985 with a Tender Shoulder, out for one week...
Signed as a free agent by Cleveland on 2/1/1987 to a 3-year deal worth $10,070,000 per year...
Injured on 4/11/1988 with a Inflamed Bicep Muscle, out for 2-3 weeks...
Injured on 9/25/1988 with a Strained Elbow Ligament, out for 5-6 weeks...
